    old "Hello, world!"
    new "Merhaba, d√ºnya!"

formats.note: Both formats work perfectly in Ren'Py engine. The difference is only in syntax style and readability.

unren.title: UnRen Integration Guide
unren.description: RenLocalizer downloads and caches UnRen before analysis. Automatic mode is still experimental, so watch the log output and switch to manual if something stalls:

versions.title: Which UnRen build should I launch?
versions.description: The first two menu entries point to different Python runtimes. Match the option to the Ren'Py version used by the game:

options.title: UnRen-current.bat
options.description: Python 3-based release for modern Ren'Py builds. Handles the archive layout used by 7.4+ and Ren'Py 8 projects.
options.note: Check game/renpy/common/version.txt or the splash screen‚Äîif it shows 7.4 or any 8.x/Py3 build, pick this option.

options.title: UnRen-legacy.bat
options.description: Classic Python 2 toolchain that matches older games and 32-bit distributions.
options.note: Choose this when the game launches with a Py2 runtime, ships only a 32-bit exe, or when UnRen-current.bat fails with compatibility errors.

automatic.title: Automatic Mode (experimental)
points: Runs menu options 1 + 2 (extract RPA, decompile RPYC) sequentially with safe defaults
Streams live output to the Logs tab; if you see a pending prompt, cancel and continue in manual mode
If the console refuses to close, stop the UnRen task and finish manually‚Äîalready extracted data stays intact

manual.title: Manual Mode
points: Opens the UnRen console so you can chain advanced menu blocks (3-6, a-l, registry helpers)
Ideal when enabling developer tools, bypassing protection, or injecting mods
Great fallback when automatic mode hangs because you can see the exact menu step
manual.warning: Incorrect menu choices can permanently modify the project‚Äîskip steps you don't fully understand.

checklist.title: Pre-flight Checklist
items: Make sure the selected folder contains the game/ directory at its root.
Back up the project or work on a copy before modifying any assets.
Ensure antivirus/SmartScreen is not blocking UnRen-current.bat.
Free disk space should be roughly 2√ó the combined size of the .rpa archives.

manual_flow.title: Manual Mode Flow

steps.title: 1) Download and verify
steps.detail: Note the path shown in the download-complete message; use Help ‚Üí UnRen ‚Üí Download again if you need fresh files.

steps.title: 2) Launch manual mode
steps.detail: Confirm the path printed on the first console line points to the game root (folder that contains game/).

steps.title: 3) Option 1 ‚Äì Extract RPAs
steps.detail: Wait until every .rpa archive finishes; capture the console output if any error appears.

steps.title: 4) Option 2 ‚Äì Decompile RPYC
steps.detail: Allow UnRen to overwrite .rpyc files; keep the window open until you see the final 'Done' message.

steps.title: 5) Optional extras
steps.detail: Use options 3-6 or a-l if you need developer tools, protection bypass, or additional mod helpers.

steps.title: 6) Keep the console open
steps.detail: If you notice more archives, rerun the commands in the same session; close the window only when you're finished.

manual_flow.note: If something fails, don't close the window immediately‚Äîgrab a screenshot so the output isn't lost, then retry the step.

verification.title: Post-run Verification
items: You should see fresh .rpy files under game/; rerun step 2 if only .rpyc files remain.
Leave the original .rpa archives in place so repeated runs can compare against them.
Running 'Scan Files' inside RenLocalizer should no longer show the ‚ÄúRPYC/RPA missing‚Äù warning.
logs/unren_auto.log (when present) shows exactly where the last automatic session ended‚Äîreview new error lines.

tips: Always run UnRen from the game root; picking a subfolder will extract nothing.
Back up .rpy files before allowing any overwrite/delete prompts.
Feel free to switch to manual mode if automatic mode stalls; previously extracted files are preserved.
Right-click the console title bar ‚Üí Edit ‚Üí Mark to copy long sections of output.

items.resolution: Verify you have write access to the game folder and that antivirus isn't blocking the .bat file. Launch cmd as Administrator and run UnRen-current.bat manually if needed.
Check the Logs tab; if you see prompts like 'Press any key', cancel automatic mode and rerun the same options manually.

items.issue: Extracted files are missing inside RenLocalizer
items.resolution: Confirm Settings ‚Üí General ‚Üí Project Directory points to the game root, then click Scan Files again‚Äîoutputs sometimes land in a parallel subfolder.

unren.footer: Review docs/external/UnRen-current.bat to inspect every prompt and default choice.
